original_title: Belarus Ambassador visits National Chamber of Commerce
original_body_lines: New Delhi-based Belarus Ambassador for Sri Lanka Andrei Rzheussky visited the National Chamber of Commerce (NCCSL) recently, along with the officials from the Embassy to explore bilateral trade and economic cooperation.

The delegates were received by NCCSL President Deepal Nelson, Senior Deputy President Anura Warnakulasooriya, National Chamber Automobile and Automotive Components Committee Chairman Sarath Algama, National Chamber Engineering and Construction Committee Chairman Kalana Alwis, National Chamber Gem and Jewellery Committee Chairman Pinsiri Wijepala, Council Member and National Chamber Youth Forum President Dumindu Karunagoda and Secretary General/CEO Bandula Dissanayake and discussed the opportunities among their respective industries. It is expected to conduct B2B virtual meetings between the National Chamber of Commerce of Sri Lanka and National Centre for Marketing and Price Study (NCMPS) of Belarus in the near future.
